1.content: Analyze current order processing workflow and identify bottlenecks
1.details:
1. Map existing order flow from checkout to fulfillment
2. Identify manual processes that can be automated
3. Analyze order processing times and pain points
4. Review customer feedback on order experience
5. Document current integrations (Stripe, Supabase, notifications)
6. Assess dual product architecture impact on processing

2.details:
1. Automated order status tracking and updates
2. Smart order routing based on product type (Core vs Catalog)
3. Priority queuing for high-value customers and rush orders
4. Automated inventory allocation and back-order management
5. Exception handling for payment issues, stock-outs, etc.
6. Integration with existing notification system

3.details:
1. Order confirmation automation with personalized details
2. Shipping notifications with tracking integration
3. Delivery confirmations and follow-up
4. Proactive issue resolution (delays, stock issues)
5. Review requests and customer satisfaction surveys
6. Integration with KCT Knowledge API for personalized messaging

4.details:
1. Fraud detection and security automation
2. Returns and exchange processing workflow
3. Bundle order handling optimization
4. Wedding party and group order management
5. Rush order expediting system
6. Customer service dashboard integration

5.content: Deploy and test order processing improvements
5.details:
1. Deploy enhanced order management system
2. Test all automated workflows end-to-end
3. Monitor processing times and error rates
4. Gather user feedback and iterate
5. Train team on new processes
